feed.title: Category: first-post | Blog of Alex Oberhauser

entry.title: WTF!?! Do you need really another blog?
entry.content:
The short answer is no. The long answer is, it depends… For example if I want to write some non-technical articles that are easier to read… or if I want to share with you my experience as entrepreneur… And by the way since when do I need a license for a blog!?

The Networld blog (see http://blog.networld.to) is only from time to time active. Nevertheless I have decided to setup this blog in order to be more visible and don’t hide behind a meta-project. It gives me also the possibility to write about stuff that is not directly related to Networld or one of the sub-projects. But don’t expect too much. I am not going to write about my private life – who the hell cares anyway!?! Except of the three letter services of course.

On the other side I will give you information about the current efforts that are related to my company Sigimera Ltd., but that don’t fit into any other channel. Other than that I have absolutely no clue what to write here. Maybe I will tell you also about my motivation and how I overcome the difficulties that are for free in a startup.

And at the end the full truth why this blog exists… Octopress running on github.io is fun to use. Nothing more, nothing less.
